resources.string:
This program makes it easy to learn words of any foreign language.

 This program searches the directory "/dictfiles/" for dictionary text files.

 Files must have a .txt extension.

 If no directory or files are found, the program uses the default dictionary file placed in the program code.

 Text dictionary files must have the following format:

 branch==oddział+ gałąź+ filia
 determine==ustalać+ decydować
 whether==czy
 prompt==podpowiedć+ podpowiedz+ monit
 etc

 Each keyword and its translation must be on the same line in the text file.

 The key word is separated from its translations by ==.
